extension.name: org.example.nifi.processors.zip_processor.createPasswordProtectZipFile
extension.description: Creates a password protected ZIP file from the FlowFile content using the Zip4j library

property.name: Password
property.description: Password used to encrypt the ZIP file

relationship.name: failure
relationship.description: Failed to create password protected zip file

relationship.name: success
relationship.description: Successfully created password protected zip file

readsAttribute.name: filename
readsAttribute.description: Filename attribute is used to name the temporary file for zipping

writesAttribute.name: zip.filename
writesAttribute.description: The name of the generated zip file
